text:
Raskolnikov glared at Svidrigaïlov. 

"Do I have to bother with you now?" 

Svidrigaïlov smiled. 

"Why the rush?" 

Raskolnikov's voice was sharp. 

"I’ll kill you if you harm my sister." 

Svidrigaïlov raised an eyebrow. 

"You think I have plans?" 

"Make haste," Raskolnikov urged. 

"Time is precious." 

"You want me to be frank?" 

"Yes," Raskolnikov replied, tension in his voice. 

"Then why not answer me?" 

"Everyone has his own agenda," Raskolnikov said darkly. 

Svidrigaïlov chuckled. 

"The game isn’t worth the candle."

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov confronts Svidrigaïlov about his intentions towards his sister, threatening violence if necessary.
